element.element: Designers and developers

Designers, in order to build maintainable, optimized and full featured Flash websites, you only need Silex and whatever software you use to design the background, illustrations, etc. In Silex you can add interactivity and build the structure of your publication. With Flash you will be able to add more complex interactivity and customize components and animation.SILEX users have chosen this tool for : * its automatic SEO system * its multilingual contexts management * its constant evolution * its documentation and the ever growing designers and developers community * the SILEX components and themes provided with it * the Flash look and feel of the produced applications * its legitimate integration in the CS5 package * its short learning curveLinks * get started with the online demo: http://demos.silexlabs.org/silex/ * showcase: http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/rate-showcase/ * download themes and components: http://exchange.silexlabs.org/Dynamic sites development

Designers, in order to build maintainable, optimized and full featured Flash websites, you only need Silex and whatever software you use to design the background, illustrations, etc. In Silex you can add interactivity and build the structure of your publication. With Flash you will be able to add more complex interactivity and customize components and animation.

SILEX users have chosen this tool for :

* its automatic SEO system

* its multilingual contexts management

* its constant evolution

* its documentation and the ever growing designers and developers community

* the SILEX components and themes provided with it

* the Flash look and feel of the produced applications

* its legitimate integration in the CS5 package

* its short learning curve

Links

* get started with the online demo: http://demos.silexlabs.org/silex/

* showcase: http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/rate-showcase/

* download themes and components: http://exchange.silexlabs.org/
